meanings.definition: In a manner relating to prosthetics.
meanings.sent1: She walked prosthetically, with the help of her artificial leg.
meanings.sent2: The athlete ran prosthetically, showcasing the advancements in technology.
meanings.sent3: The robot danced prosthetically, impressing the audience with its precision.
meanings.sent4: The car moved prosthetically, as if it had a mind of its own.
meanings.sent5: The wind howled prosthetically through the trees, creating an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: He had a prosthetically enhanced arm that helped him lift heavy objects.
meanings.sent2: The prosthetically designed hand allowed her to grasp things with ease.
meanings.sent3: The prosthetically modified bike was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: Her prosthetically altered voice sounded robotic yet melodic.
meanings.sent5: The prosthetically attached wings enabled the bird to soar through the sky.
